languages.text: "Бывает. За годы общения с ксеносами я неплохо так изучила их повадки и даже обучилась языку — правда, стоит мне на нем заговорить, как те начинают кривиться. Высокомерные ублюдки! Им не по нраву даже наши голоса, зато от ценностей не отказываются никогда. Впрочем, к гримасам мне не привыкать — если слишком чистоплюйствовать, останешься не у дел".

"It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."
languages.original_text: "Бывает. За годы общения с ксеносами я неплохо так изучила их повадки и даже обучилась языку — правда, стоит мне на нем заговорить, как те начинают кривиться. Высокомерные ублюдки! Им не по нраву даже наши голоса, зато от ценностей не отказываются никогда. Впрочем, к гримасам мне не привыкать — если слишком чистоплюйствовать, останешься не у дел".

traits.locale_text: "It happens. Over the years of dealing with maadari I learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant bastards! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. On the other hand, I am used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

Arrogant bastards! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. On the other hand, I am used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “这已经是众所周知的事情了。我与异形打了很多年交道，很了解他们的习俗，甚至学会了他们的一部分语言。只是每次我开始说话的时候，他们就会感到厌烦。那群傲慢的家伙甚至连我们的声音都嫌恶！不过，他们从来不会拒绝我们的贵重物品。话说回来，我已经习惯于客户不给好脸色看了。干这一行，那些容易被冒犯的人是坚持不下去的。”
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: “这已经是众所周知的事情了。我与异形打了很多年交道，很了解他们的习俗，甚至学会了他们的一部分语言。只是每次我开始说话的时候，他们就会感到厌烦。那群傲慢的家伙甚至连我们的声音都嫌恶！不过，他们从来不会拒绝我们的贵重物品。话说回来，我已经习惯于客户不给好脸色看了。干这一行，那些容易被冒犯的人是坚持不下去的。”
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

languages.text: «Ha ocurrido alguna vez. Después de años tratando con xenos, he aprendido sus costumbres y hasta entiendo más o menos su idioma... pero me miran fatal cuando intento hablar. ¡Capullos arrogantes! No les gustarán nuestras voces, pero nunca les dicen que no a nuestros productos. Pero, en fin, estoy acostumbrada a las expresiones resentidas; en este negocio, si te ofendes por cualquier cosa, te quedas en la calle».
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: «Ha ocurrido alguna vez. Después de años tratando con xenos, he aprendido sus costumbres y hasta entiendo más o menos su idioma... pero me miran fatal cuando intento hablar. ¡Capullos arrogantes! No les gustarán nuestras voces, pero nunca les dicen que no a nuestros productos. Pero, en fin, estoy acostumbrada a las expresiones resentidas; en este negocio, si te ofendes por cualquier cosa, te quedas en la calle».
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「それはよくあることさ。何年も異種族とつきあっているうちに、彼らの習慣を学び、言葉もわかるようになった…まあ、あたしが話しはじめると、連中は身をすくめるんだけどね。傲慢なやつらだ！彼らはあたしらの声さえ嫌うけど、貴重品は決して追い払わない。それに、不機嫌な顔を見るのも慣れっこだ。この商売では、すぐ機嫌をそこねてちゃ、商売にならないもんさ」
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: 「それはよくあることさ。何年も異種族とつきあっているうちに、彼らの習慣を学び、言葉もわかるようになった…まあ、あたしが話しはじめると、連中は身をすくめるんだけどね。傲慢なやつらだ！彼らはあたしらの声さえ嫌うけど、貴重品は決して追い払わない。それに、不機嫌な顔を見るのも慣れっこだ。この商売では、すぐ機嫌をそこねてちゃ、商売にならないもんさ」
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Es ist schon vorgekommen. Nach jahrelangem Umgang mit Xenos habe ich ihre Bräuche kennengelernt, ich beherrsche sogar ihre Sprache ein wenig — auch wenn sie das Gesicht verziehen, sobald ich sie spreche. Arrogante Säcke! Sie verabscheuen sogar unsere Stimmen, doch unsere Wertgegenstände verschmähen sie nie. Andererseits bin ich es gewohnt, miesepetrige Gesichter zu sehen — in dieser Branche braucht man ein dickes Fell."
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist schon vorgekommen. Nach jahrelangem Umgang mit Xenos habe ich ihre Bräuche kennengelernt, ich beherrsche sogar ihre Sprache ein wenig — auch wenn sie das Gesicht verziehen, sobald ich sie spreche. Arrogante Säcke! Sie verabscheuen sogar unsere Stimmen, doch unsere Wertgegenstände verschmähen sie nie. Andererseits bin ich es gewohnt, miesepetrige Gesichter zu sehen — in dieser Branche braucht man ein dickes Fell."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Parfois. Après avoir côtoyé les xénos pendant des années, j'ai appris leurs coutumes et même leur langue, sauf qu'ils grimacent dès que je commence à parler. Cette bande d'arrogants ! Même nos voix leur déplaisent, mais ils ne crachent jamais sur nos objets de valeur. Enfin, j'ai l'habitude des visages maussades. Dans ce métier, ceux qui se laissent facilement vexer ne font pas long feu. »
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: « Parfois. Après avoir côtoyé les xénos pendant des années, j'ai appris leurs coutumes et même leur langue, sauf qu'ils grimacent dès que je commence à parler. Cette bande d'arrogants ! Même nos voix leur déplaisent, mais ils ne crachent jamais sur nos objets de valeur. Enfin, j'ai l'habitude des visages maussades. Dans ce métier, ceux qui se laissent facilement vexer ne font pas long feu. »
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Yaptığım bilinir. Yıllarca zenolarla haşır neşir olduktan sonra davranış biçimlerini öğrendim, hatta dillerini bile biraz çözdüm. Her konuştuğumda yüzlerini ekşitirler, o ayrı. Kendini beğenmiş pislikler! Sesimize bile tahammül edemiyorlar ama değerli mallarımıza sırt çevirmiyorlar da. Hoş, ekşi yüzlere bakmaya alışığımdır. Her şeye alınanlar çok çabuk kepenk kapatır."
languages.original_text: "It has been known to happen. After years of dealing with xenos, I've learned their customs and even got a grasp of their language — except they cringe whenever I start speaking. Arrogant sods! They dislike even our voices, but they never turn away our valuables. Then again, I'm used to seeing sour faces — in this trade, the easily offended go out of business."

traits.locale_text: "Böyle şeyler yaşandı. Yıllarca zenolarla haşır neşir olduktan sonra davranış biçimlerini öğrendim, hatta dillerini bile biraz çözdüm. Her konuştuğumda yüzlerini ekşitirler, o ayrı. Kendini beğenmiş pislikler! Seslerimize bile tahammül edemiyorlar ama değerli mallarımıza da sırt çevirmiyorlar. Hoş, ekşi yüzlere bakmaya alışığımdır, bu meslekte her şeye alınanların iflas etmeleri uzun sürmez."
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion
